title: Body Panels & Accessories
description: Install body panels, seats, lights, and accessories to complete the cart.

steps.title: Body Panel Installation
steps.instructions: Install front and rear body panels. Ensure proper alignment and secure with fasteners.

safetyWarnings.text: Panels have sharp edges. Wear gloves.

knowledgeChecks.question: Why wear gloves when handling body panels?
knowledgeChecks.explanation: Body panels have sharp edges that can cause cuts.
